name: Flicker (itch) (annalog)
description:
[entry for the college game jam]

[high scores here until I implement an online version]

Keep the lights on... or else. 

Edgar - 
Sorry to leave you on the 3am shift tonight. I know it's your first time after-hours but I know you'll do alright. Make sure to turn the lights back on after they flicker out in order to keep away those pesky bats. Rats with wings, let me tell ya. If the bats stay at the lampposts for too long, well, they'll mess with the electrical system... permanently. We don't want that. Don't forget!!
See ya tomorrow, 
Gordon

Use WASD to move and E to turn on lamps. You can pause by pressing Escape. 

[follow my twitter: https://twitter.com/itsannalog]
